explanation: [0-0] A football field with many spectators in the surrounding stands and security personnel in yellow-green tops. The green LED screens around the field display car advertisements, with a car pushing a football forward. Players in green jerseys and players in white and blue striped jerseys are on the field, running around, and a football falls from above the screen.

[0-8] The player in the green jersey reaches out his right foot to catch the football, which rolls to the left of the screen. The player chases after the ball, and the number 10 can be seen on the back of his jersey. Three players in white and blue striped jerseys surround the number 10 player. The number 10 player kicks the ball to his right with his right foot and chases after it. The number 10 player catches up to the ball and kicks it out. The player in the white and blue striped jersey tries to block the ball but fails. The football passes over the heads of the players in green jerseys and white and blue striped jerseys, through the goalkeeper in the red jersey, and scores a goal. The spectators in the stands stand up and cheer. Finally, the color of the advertisement on the field screen changes from gray to green as the car pushes the football forward.
